analysis.key_quote: I do not believe this proposal is made in good faith, as it has not shown why it is necessary nor how it will concretely be prevented from political manipulation.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposal, highlighting concerns about politicization and the importance of maintaining a merit-based system in research agencies. It emphasizes the need for career officers who understand the long-term strategic value of organizations, which aligns with the themes of merit and due process.
